member.name: T:Muon.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuHelper
member.summary: Helper class for .

member.name: M:Muon.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuHelper.GetPlacementTarget(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the placement target element of the context menu to which an object belongs. The object must be in the logical tree of a element.
member.param: The object for which to find the placement target element.
member.returns: The to which the context menu belongs or null if the placement target could not be found.

member.name: T:Muon.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Muon.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Muon.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Muon.Windows.Controls.RecentFileButton
member.summary: Represents a Recent File button control. The control contains a file name part, a directory path part and an optional image part.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:Muon.Windows.Controls.RecentFileButton.DirPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory path that is displayed in the button.

member.name: P:Muon.Windows.Controls.RecentFileButton.DirPathFontSize

member.summary: Gets or sets the background brush when the mouse pointer is located over the button. The default value is .
